messages.title: Re-elect
messages.content: I am privileged to have been selected as the SNP candidate for Ross, Skye & Lochaber in this election. My pledge to voters is to continue to be a hard-working MP speaking up for all the constituents of this vast Highland & Island constituency. As has been the case since May 2015, I will be a highly visible MP answerable to all who live here.

leaflet.personalStatement: My pledge to voters is to continue to be a hard-working MP speaking up for all the constituents of this vast Highland & Island constituency. As has been the case since May 2015, I will be a highly visible MP answerable to all who live here.
